text: @piersmorgan @MattHancock @BorisJohnson In New York a very large percentage of COVID-19 related deaths occurred in nursing homes -- to Governor Andrew Cuomo's shame.  But because I am no leftist I wil not ask, How many did you kill, Andrew?
